Posts.EditableText:
Hello,

How do I load a .squiffy file into the online editor?   I want to keep copies locally, not just online but there appears to be no way to load them from my c drive for editing. 

Thanks in advance.
Posts.HTML:
Hello,

How do I load a .squiffy file into the online editor? I want to keep copies locally, not just online but there appears to be no way to load them from my c drive for editing.

Thanks in advance.

Posts.EditableText: Just copy and paste the text into the editor.
Posts.HTML: Just copy and paste the text into the editor.
